name: Space Battalion Alpha
description:
Simple, short vertical shoot'em up for up to four players in couch coop. This game is meant to be easy.

Modes: campaign, level select and survival.

The game is complete, but I couldn't test couch coop completely on my own, so let me know if you encounter any bugs and I'll fix'em ASAP. :)

Update: Free demo added! :)

IMPORTANT: Android version is single player only.
